name: as-css
description: Component-scoped CSS that runs in the browser without build tooling.

scripts.build:pages: npm run build && rm -rf .pages && mkdir -p .pages/examples .pages/src .pages/dist && cp examples/*.html .pages/examples/ && cp src/as-css.js .pages/src/ && cp dist/as-css.min.js dist/as-css.min.js.map .pages/dist/ && cp index.html .pages/index.html && touch .pages/.nojekyll

author: Sree Kotay
